answers.answer: Eat a good breakfast before you go.

Fast fast and fast:) Nothing to eat after midnight. May have water. This will ensure you the best result and plus you don't want it to interfere and you have to do another 3 hour test. Fingers crossed and good vibes sent your way good luck!
The Dr told me to make sure I didn't eat or drink anything besides water but mine was early in the morning so it was ok for me not to eat anything until after I had it done

Yeah Dr told me no food or water after midnight...I think he has already ordered the 3 hour one, not sure though...Have had some problems this pregnancy...I was told to plan for several hours at the hospital, but they are doing some other tests/ultrasounds also...
Any flavor recommendations? Should I try to eat right after it is over or wait a little while??

I would try something afterwards especially if you will be there for a bit. Dry things to start off cereals, cracjers, plain chips etc..if that sits well jump into something more to satisfy your hunger:)

If they let you choose the color of the drink you will be taking try to go for the orange one that's the one I had and didn't taste bad at all but the other girls that were there has the red one and the purple one and were gaging while taking it and I drank mine in less that a min. :)
I had the orange one once, testing for regular diabetes,  it tasted like flat orange soda. Wasn't  bad.  I personally won't  be eating before any glucose test.
Thanks ladies! I'll take some crackers with me for after and ask for the orange one if I get a choice!

I agree I had the orange 1 and it tasted almost like the Mexican soda Jarritos. Wasn't bad at all. However my Dr told me to eat before I went the technician also wanted to make sure I'd eaten before taking the test I wonder why after reading the posts above.  I had a high protein breakfast
I wasn't allowed to eat 2 hours before and I was told to have eggs for breakfast. I passed. I had the fruit pun ch and it wasn't bad at all.

question: I am going for my glucose test tomorrow morning...any of you have any advice for me???
